title: International Labour Conference empowered to abrogate obsolete Conventions (ILO - International Labour Organization)
text: ( Source : ILO - International Labour Organization ) The 1997 amendment of the ILO Constitution which permits the abrogation of obsolete labour Conventions, has entered into force following its ratification by the Cook Islands - the
